name: LOW (itch)
description:
My 64x64 low res game made for the LOWREZJAM 2021! I randomly found the jam when there were 8 days left so I don't know when it began. It was really fun to experiment with a low resolution and this limitation also drew my attention to the properties of the Windows window. That's also the reason I didn't make a web build I'm sorry for that >.<

I wonder what happens when you have 100 points....

Controls:

move with WASD or the Arrow Keys

shoot with Space

First release: 7/7/2021 - ver1.0 - 7 days left

hehe that was way too early

8/7/2021 - ver1.1 - 6 days left

-removed anti aliasing, made font more readable, added more particles

-finally added a highscore system! making the text readable was hard
